Rattling Wrath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Cha 15, tiefling, rogue
Benefit: When you use your infernal wrath racial power, any rattling powers you use against the target before the end of your next turn apply a -4 penalty to the target’s attack rolls instead of a -2 penalty.


Update (4/9/2010)
Replace the Benefit entry with the following text: “When you use your infernal wrath racial power, any rattling powers you use against the target before the end of your next turn apply a –4 penalty to the target’s attack rolls instead of a –2 penalty.”

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 138.
